abstracts.cdata!:
This Project Completion Report (PCR)
            reviews the performance of the Industrial Credit Project in
            Jamaica. The principal objectives of the project were to:
            (a) assist National Development Bank (NDB) in establishing
            and testing sound policies, procedures and organizational
            arrangements for financing private investment projects; (b)
            provide term financing to NDB for onlending through approved
            financial intermediaries (AFIs) for sound industrial
            projects of new and expanding private enterprises and, in
            the process, to improve the financial position and
            efficiency of these enterprises; and (c) induce commercial
            banks and other financial intermediaries to undertake
            appraisal, financing, and supervision of sound investment projects.
